name: ModelFile

commentData.description:
Class representing a Model File. A Model File contains a single namespace
and a set of model elements: assets, transactions etc.

tags.title: memberof
tags.description: module:composer-common

methods.name: getModelManager

commentData.description: Returns the ModelManager associated with this ModelFile

tags.title: return
tags.description: The ModelManager for this ModelFile

description: Returns the ModelManager associated with this ModelFile
The ModelManager for this ModelFile

commentData.description: Returns the types that have been imported into this ModelFile.

tags.description: The array of imports for this ModelFile

description: Returns the types that have been imported into this ModelFile.

methods.name: isDefined

commentData.description: Returns true if the type is defined in the model file

tags.description: the name of the type
tags.name: type

tags.title: return
tags.description: true if the type (asset or transaction) is defined

description: Returns true if the type is defined in the model file
true if the type (asset or transaction) is defined
